short_summary: Lease and rental of property or building / Real estate management services / Property management services / Facilities management
description: CMHC has a large real estate portfolio and key locations are the National Office Complex in Ottawa, Ontario and various business centers and real estate property throughout Canada.
full_summary:
# Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) Tender announcement ####################

### Overview

Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites parties interested in providing real estate and facilities management services to express their interest in this procurement process.

### Classification

**procurementcategory** : Service
**procurementmethod** : Competitive - Selective Tendering
**selectioncriteria** : Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Location

Services are required for a portfolio of properties located in various cities across Canada, including:

* Calgary, Alberta
* Ottawa, Ontario
* Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Vancouver, British Columbia
* Montreal, Quebec
* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* Halifax, Nova Scotia

### Description

CMHC has a large real estate portfolio and requires a third-party service provider to deliver real estate and facilities management services, including:

* Facility management
* Space management
* Project management
* Lease administration
* Asset management

Respondents must be capable of delivering these services at a provincial or national level.

### Important Dates

*   **Publication date**: 2023-07-01
*   **Tender closing date**: 2023-08-04T14:00:00
*   **Expected contract start date**: 2024-04-01
*   **Expected contract end date**: 2031-03-31

### Contracting Entity Details

*   **Contracting entity name**: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC)
*   **Contracting entity address**: 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0P7
*   **Contact person**: Ryan Lemay
*   **Contact email**: rlemay@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
*   **Contact phone**: (604) 737-4019

### Attachments

Tender documents and additional information can be found in the following PDF documents:

*   [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6473/cmhc-npp001427-the-provision-of-real-estate-and-facilities-management-services_0.pdf)
*   [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6473/schl-amp001427-la-prestation-de-services-de-gestion-des-immeubles-et-des-installations_1.pdf)

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian
